element.definition: The name(s) by which the patient is officially known.
element.comment: At least one name must be provided for identification.
element.requirements: Need to track the patient by name for clinical and administrative purposes.
element.meaningWhenMissing: If no name is provided, the patient cannot be identified by name.
element.orderMeaning: Names are ordered by preference, with the most preferred name first.

element.definition: The date of birth for the individual.
element.comment: Partial dates are allowed (year only, year-month).

element.meaningWhenMissing: This resource is generally assumed to be active if no value is provided for the active element.
